4. Town Council

Town Council
============

Members
-------

* Mayor with 4 Year Term
* 4 Council Members with 4 Year Term

Election
--------

* Mayor elected directly by the voters - Term 4 Years
* Council elected directly by the voters - Term 4 Years
* Deputy Mayor chosen by the majority vote of Township Council

**Mayor and Council**
---------------------

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **John Leggio, Mayor** Term Expires:  12/31/2028 **Deputy Mayor** Term Expires:    **Susan Fischer, Councilwoman** Term Expires:  12/31/2026     **Ian Nadel, Councilman** Term Expires:  12/31/2026   **Evelyn O'Donnell, Councilwoman** Term Expires:  12/31/2028 |  |

### • Contact Us •

1. Howell Township Municipal Building  
   4567 Rt 9 North, 2nd Floor  
   Howell, NJ 07731-3382

   Phone: [(732) 938-4500](tel:7329384500)  
   Hours: 8:30 am - 4:30 pm

   [Contact](https://www.twp.howell.nj.us/directory)  
   Note: The Municipal Court & Police Dept. are located at 300 Old Tavern Road.
